name: Meridian Tennis
address: населённый пункт Бешкурган, ул. Карвон йули, 92
description: Meridian Tennis is the perfect destination for tennis enthusiasts! Our state-of-the-art indoor courts are made of hard surface, providing a great playing experience for players of all skill levels. Whether you're a beginner looking to learn the basics or an experienced player looking to sharpen your skills, our on-site coach is available to help. And if you don't have your own racket or balls, don't worry - we provide them for you! After your match, take a shower and freshen up in our well-equipped locker rooms. Book your court today and experience the best in tennis at Meridian Tennis
